tagblock.name: Data

float32.name: AI Infantry-On-AI Weapon Damage Scale
float32.tooltip: Global scale on weapon damage made by AI on other AI

float32.name: AI Vehicle-On-AI Weapon Damage Scale
float32.tooltip: Global scale on weapon damage made by AI in a vehicle on other AI

float32.name: AI Player Vehicle-On-AI Weapon Damage Scale
float32.tooltip: Global scale on weapon damage made by AI in a vehicle with the player on other AI

tagblock.comment: The maximum ranges to which firing point evaluations will do pathfinding searches. INCREASING THESE VALUES WILL ALMOST CERTAINLY HAVE A NEGATIVE IMPACT ON PERFORMANCE.

float32.name: Scary Target Threshold
float32.tooltip: A target of this scariness is offically considered scary (by combat dialogue, etc.)

float32.name: Scary Weapon Threshold
float32.tooltip: A weapon of this scariness is offically considered scary (by combat dialogue, etc.)

float32.name: Invincible Scariness
float32.tooltip: when an actor's target is invincible, he is this much more scared

tagblock.comment: A few properties to help define when it is safe for a mission critical character to ressurect.

float32.name: Minimum Death Time
float32.tooltip: I will be dead for at least this long

float32.name: Projectile Distance
float32.tooltip: If there is a projectile within this distance of me, I'll stay dead

float32.name: Idle Clump Distance
float32.tooltip: If there is any enemy clump within this distance of me, I'll stay dead

float32.name: Dangerous Clump Distance
float32.tooltip: If there is any enemy clump with a status higher than idle within this distance of me, I'll stay dead

tagblock.comment: A few properties to help define when it is safe for a mission critical character to teleport.

float32.name: Cover Search Duration
float32.tooltip: The number of seconds that must elapse before we try to look for a firing point behind cover to teleport to.

float32.name: Task Direction Search Duration
float32.tooltip: The number of seconds we try to look for a firing point that aligns us with the actor's task direction.

tagblock.comment: Some values to help you control how much guys will throttle when they want to stick with the rest of their squad.

float32.name: Stop Distance
float32.tooltip: At this distance from the squad, stop.

float32.name: Resume Distance
float32.tooltip: At this distance from the squad, start again.

float32.name: Minimum Distance
float32.tooltip: Start throttling back at this distance

float32.name: Maximum Distance
float32.tooltip: Maximum throttle scale at this distance

float32.name: Minimum Scale
float32.tooltip: Minimum throttle value.

float32.name: Passthrough Chance
float32.tooltip: Chance of passing through a patrol objective without pausing

float32.name: Search Phase Skip Chance
float32.tooltip: Chance of skipping the search phase when stopped at a patrol objective

float32.name: Patrol Transition Timeout
float32.tooltip: If the squad takes more than this time to get to their new patrol point, cancel it and go on to the next.

float32.name: Patrol Maneuver Timeout
float32.tooltip: If the squad takes longer than this time to reposition within a patrol point (e.g. searching and pausing), cancel the point and go on to the next.

rangef.name: Patrol Search Firing Point Time
rangef.tooltip: spend this amount of time at a search firing position when in search phase

float32.name: Patrol Isolation Distance
float32.tooltip: If you are more than this distance from your nearest squadmate, you are officially isolated.

float32.name: Patrol Isolation Time
float32.tooltip: If you are isolated for more than this time, you get deleted.

tagblock.comment: These parameters control how the kung-fu circle works (i.e. when tasks have kungfu-count associated with them)

float32.name: Kungfu Deactivation Delay
float32.tooltip: When a task is disallowed from shooting, turn it off after this delay

comment.title: Presearch Child Counts (0 Means No Limit)

tagblock.name: Vision Traits
tagblock.comment: Traits that affect the AI's vision

float32.name: Vision Distance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the distance at which an AI can see their target.

float32.name: Vision Angle Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the angles of the AI's vision cone.

tagblock.name: Sound Traits
tagblock.comment: Traits that affect the AI's sound awareness

float32.name: Hearing Distance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the character's hearing distance.

tagblock.name: Luck Traits
tagblock.comment: Traits that affect the AI's luck

float32.name: Evasion Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of evading fire.

float32.name: Grenade Dive Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of diving from grenades.

float32.name: Broken Kamikaze Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of going kamikaze when broken.

float32.name: Leader Dead Retreat Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of retreating when your leader dies.

float32.name: Dive Retreat Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of retreating after a dive.

float32.name: Shield Depleted Berserk Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of berserking when your shield is depleted.

float32.name: Leader Abandoned Berserk Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of a leader berserking when all his followers die.

float32.name: Melee Attack Delay Timer Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the time between melee attacks.

float32.name: Melee Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of meleeing.

float32.name: Melee Leap Delay Timer Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the delay for performing melee leaps.

float32.name: Throw Grenade Delay Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the time between grenade throws.

tagblock.name: Grenade Traits
tagblock.comment: Traits that affect the AI's grenade use

float32.name: Velocity Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the velocity at which AI throws grenades

float32.name: Throw Grenade Delay Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the time between grenade throws.

range16.name: Search Pattern Cells Per Shell Range
